name: Osprey Savu 5 Waist Pack - Men's
categories: Shoulder bags, slings and waist packs
description:
Ditch the backpack on your next ride. This lumbar pack carries 2 water bottles and has internal organization for your tools. The bike-specific angled hipbelt and compression straps keep the pack stable and close to your body to prevent bouncing.Extra-thick ridged foam back panel has a central venting channel.Mesh-backed hipbelt has an easy-pull closure for a snug fit.2 zippered hipbelt pockets carry snacks and small items.Reflective loop holds blinky light (not included).2 sleeves hold standard-sized bike bottles (not included) and lay flat when you don't need them.

        Sustainability
